name: Ahmed Hossain
bio: With over two decades of culinary expertise, Chef Ahmed Hossain is a distinguished figure in Bangladeshi gastronomy. Known for his signature 'Bhapa Ilish', a steamed hilsa fish masterpiece, he seamlessly combines tradition with innovation. An advocate for sustainability, Chef Ahmed is committed to showcasing Bangladesh's culinary heritage to the world.
